diff_act: 4.display a message on the screen indicating that the call is active

regen.absent_element: the system does not specify what happens if the call is connected but there is no loudspeaker available or it is not functioning properly
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide an audible and visual indication to the driver if the call is connected but cannot be connected to the loudspeaker due to unavailability or malfunction.

regen.absent_element: specification for handling call disconnection or termination
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide an audible and visual indication to the driver when the call is disconnected or terminated, and remove the call from the loudspeaker.
The system shall automatically disconnect the call from the loudspeaker and cease audible and visual indications when the call is terminated or upon a specific command from the driver.

label: If the system is not able to connect the call, an audible and visual indication shall be provided to the driver that the call was not received by the controller.
